name: Elegoo OrangeStorm Giga
printer_notes: Large format Klipper printer with Moonraker API. 800x800x1000mm build volume.

orcaslicer_settings.start_gcode:
G28 ; Home
G1 Z5 F3000 ; lift nozzle
M104 S[first_layer_temperature] ; set nozzle temp
M140 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; set bed temp
M190 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; wait for bed temp
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] ; wait for nozzle temp
PRIME_LINE
orcaslicer_settings.end_gcode:
G91 ; relative positioning
G1 E-2 F2700 ; retract
G1 Z10 F3000 ; lift
G90 ; absolute positioning
G1 X0 Y800 F6000 ; move to back
M104 S0 ; turn off hotend
M140 S0 ; turn off bed
M84 ; disable motors
